title: Learning Management System (LMS)
popup: Name the Learning Management System adopted to deliver your online courses

title: Synchronous online learning and teaching
popup: List technologies adopted for synchronous online delivery

title: Communication and collaboration
popup: List communication and collaboration technologies adopted – excluding those in your LMS (e.g. wikis, blogs, forums, video conferencing)

title: Assessment
popup: List assessment technologies adopted – excluding those in your LMS (e.g. online assessment, plagiarism detection, online assignment submission, gradebook)

title: Offline multimedia
popup: List offline multimedia technologies adopted (e.g. screen capture, website creation, web content management system)

title: Digital Object Management System/Digital Object Repository/Learning Content Management System
popup: List technologies adopted to manage and store digital objects

title: Presentation/Lecture Capture
popup: Tool used to capture materials to associate with your LMS

title: POD/VOD casting
popup: List audio/video technologies adopted for POD/VOD casts – excluding those in your LMS

title: Mobile learning
popup: List mobile technologies adopted specific to your institution or learning and teaching (e.g. Apps, responsive themes, Wi-Fi)

title: e-Simulations
popup: List technologies adopted to develop and deliver electronic, interactive simulations

title: Document learning design
popup: List technologies adopted to develop online collaborative learning activities (e.g. LAMS)

title: Learning and teaching evaluation
popup: List technologies adopted to develop and deliver learning and teaching evaluations

title: Email and calendar: staff and students
popup: List technologies adopted for staff and students to manage their email and calendar

title: Portal environment (s)
popup: List technologies adopted for your institutions portal

title: Student Management System
popup: Name the Student Management System adopted to manage student records

title: Service desk software solution / job tracking software
popup: List technologies adopted to manage the service desk and job tracking

title: Institutional research repository
popup: List technologies adopted to manage and store research data

title: Communication and collaborative tools used across high speed network
popup: List technologies adopted to enable education and research collaboration (e.g. AARNET, KAREN)

title: e-Portfolio
popup: Name the system adopted for creating electronic portfolios
